revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR612 |revision=v2 |series=N150 |asin= |fcc_date=04/01/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY309400124 |pcb_id=2976352402 |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=30:46:9A,A0:21:B7,C0:3F:0E |oui_eth=30:46:9A,A0:21:B7,C0:3F:0E }} {{TagLine|N150 Wireless Router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR612v2|vs_id=14245}} :[http://support.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/2649/~/gpl-open-source-code-for-programmers On the Netgear GPL sources page] :[ftp://downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ Netgear's GPL sources directory on their FTP server]
"2976352402" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr612v2 ''Netgear WNR612 v2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://nnm.ru/blogs/aptem82/kompaktnyy_besprovodnoy_router_netgear_wnr612/ Images and screenshots] (RU)
Per this [http://forum.netgear.ru/viewtopic.php?id=2705 NETGEAR.ru forum post], A0:21:B7 is an assumed OUI of the device.
[[Atheros]] AR7240 device. The WNR612v1 may share the same basic [http://2a.zol-img.com.cn/product/59/462/ce4xIbJrS5HSQ.jpg hardware]. :It shares all the hardware with [[Netgear WNR1000v2|WNR1000v2]] and flashing it to WNR1000v2 :firmware (over TFTP) works. The only difference is the number of LAN ports.
*The bootloader of the device uses a TFTP server. To access the TFTP server :the user must hold reset button before the device is powered on and keep on :holding it for a few seconds.
